reviewText: Just watched Breaking Shells. I am a direct support professional and I learn so much everyday from the people I support. This is a wonderful piece. It makes you more aware of all people rights. Art, Steve and Bob are role models for all of us. I am inspired to become a better support system and all around better person.

I saw this last week in Denver and can't say enough.  EVERYONE needs to see this movie, Art and Steve are incredible.  Never been to South Dakota, but think i need to go.  What a shot in the arm for folks with disabilities.

This movie is such an inspiration for people with disabilities and those who love them.  It is a "must see" for self advocates, people with disabilities, and their families!  Great job, Art and Steve - keep up the important work you are doing!
